resources.string: There is no problem matching your search!
There is no contest matching your search!
Please wait for few seconds. The problems are currently being loaded.
Please wait for few seconds. The contests are currently being loaded.
There seems to be some unknown error. Please check again later.

The app allows you to be remained about upcoming Competitive contests in some platforms like Codeforces, Codechef, TopCoder, Sphere Online Judge, AtCoder and Google. The app also allows you to search for all problems present in some these platforms.
Enter your username of corresponding platforms in the Settings to see a personalized result.
The problems of the platforms are updated every 6 hours. User submissions are updated every hour. For every 4 hours contests and rating details are updated.
Thanks to Codeforces for their APIs and https://github.com/kenkoooo for unofficial AtCoder APIs.
Data updates are subjected the details provided in above APIs. Some of the AtCoder problems are in japanese.
Look out for updates. The app will be updated when problems from other platforms are accessible or when new functionality can be implemented.
